author: Kate Sullivan, CNN
title: Joe Biden describes how he stays in touch with grandkids while social distancing
description: Former Vice President Joe Biden is not letting the threat of coronavirus stop him from keeping in touch with his five grandchildren.
content:
(CNN)Former Vice President Joe Biden is not letting the threat of coronavirus stop him from keeping in touch with his five grandchildren. 
At a CNN town hall Friday, Biden revealed how he, like many Americans, is trying to stay connected to family members wh… [+2405 chars]
